member.name: T:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi
member.summary: Provides access to community data api
member.name: community
community
community
community
community
P:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.Name
member.summary: Starting entry point name

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.#ctor(ASC.Api.Impl.ApiContext)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetPosts
member.summary: Returns the list of all posts in blogs on the portal with the post title, date of creation and update, post text and author ID and display name

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.CreatePost(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a blog post with the specified title, content, tags and subscription to comments defined in the request body

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.UpdatePost(System.Guid,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates the specified post changing the post title, content or/and tags specified
member.example:
Sending data in application/json: { title:"My post", content:"Post content", tags:"Me,Post,News" }
Sending data in application/x-www-form-urlencoded title="My post"&content="Post content"&tags="Me,Post,News"

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.DeletePost(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes the selected post from blogs

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetMyPosts
member.summary: Returns the list of all blog posts for the current user with the post title, date of creation and update, post text and author ID and display name

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetSearchPosts(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of blog posts matching the search query with the post title, date of creation and update, post text and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetUserPosts(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of blog posts of the specified user with the post title, date of creation and update and post text

param.name: username
param.remark: You can retrieve username through 'people' api

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetPostsByTag(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of blog posts containing the specified tag with the post title, date of creation and update, post text and author
member.returns: List of posts tagged with tag name

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetTags
member.summary: Returns a list of all tags used with blog posts with the post title, date of creation and update, post text, author and all the tags used

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetPost(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the detailed information for the blog post with the ID specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetComments(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the list of all the comments for the blog post with the ID specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.AddComment(System.Guid,System.String,System.Guid)
member.summary: Adds a comment to the specified post with the comment text specified. The parent comment ID can be also specified if needed.
member.remarks: Send parentId=00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 or don't send it at all if you want your comment to be on the root level

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetBlogCommentPreview(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get comment preview with the content specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.RemoveBlogComment(System.String)
member.summary: Remove comment with the id specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetBookmarks
member.summary: Returns the list of all bookmarks on the portal with the bookmark titles, date of creation and update, bookmark text and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetMyBookmarks
member.summary: Returns the list of all bookmarks for the current user with the bookmark titles, date of creation and update, bookmark text and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.SearchBookmarks(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of bookmarks matching the search query with the bookmark title, date of creation and update, bookmark description and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetFavsBookmarks
member.summary: Returns the list of favorite bookmarks for the current user with the bookmark titles, date of creation and update, bookmark text and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetBookmarksTags
member.summary: Returns a list of all tags used for bookmarks with the number showing the tag usage

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetBookmarksByTag(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the list of all bookmarks marked by the tag specified with the bookmark titles, date of creation and update, bookmark text and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetRecentBookmarks
member.summary: Returns the list of recenty added bookmarks with the bookmark titles, date of creation and update, bookmark text and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetTopDayBookmarks
member.summary: Returns the list of the bookmarks most popular on the current date with the bookmark titles, date of creation and update, bookmark text and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetTopMonthBookmarks
member.summary: Returns the list of the bookmarks most popular in the current month with the bookmark titles, date of creation and update, bookmark text and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetTopWeekBookmarks
member.summary: Returns the list of the bookmarks most popular on the current week with the bookmark titles, date of creation and update, bookmark text and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetTopYearBookmarks
member.summary: Returns the list of the bookmarks most popular in the current year with the bookmark titles, date of creation and update, bookmark text and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetBookmarkComments(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns the list of all comments to the bookmark with the specified ID

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.AddBookmarkComment(System.Int64,System.String,System.Guid)
member.summary: Adds a comment to the bookmark with the specified ID. The parent bookmark ID can be also specified if needed.
member.remarks: Send parentId=00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 or don't send it at all if you want your comment to be on the root level

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetBookmarkById(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns a detailed information on the bookmark with the specified ID

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.AddBookmark(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a bookmark with a specified title, description and tags

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetBookmarkCommentPreview(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get comment preview with the content specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.RemoveBookmarkComment(System.String)
member.summary: Remove comment with the id specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.RemoveBookmarkFromFavourite(System.Int64)
member.summary: Removes bookmark from favourite. If after removing user bookmark raiting of this bookmark is 0, the bookmark will be removed completely.

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.RemoveBookmark(System.Int64)
member.summary: Removes bookmark

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetEvents
member.summary: Returns the list of all events on the portal with the event titles, date of creation and update, event text and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.CreateEvent(System.String,System.String,ASC.Web.Community.News.Code.FeedType)
member.summary: Creates a new event with the parameters (title, content, type) specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.UpdateEvent(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,ASC.Web.Community.News.Code.FeedType)
member.summary: Updates the selected event changing the event title, content or/and event type specified

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.DeleteEvent(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the selected event

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetMyEvents
member.summary: Returns the list of all events for the current user with the event titles, date of creation and update, event text and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.SearchEvents(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of events matching the search query with the event title, date of creation and update, event type and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetEvent(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the detailed information about the event with the specified ID

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetEventComments(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the detailed information about the comments on the event with the specified ID

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.AddEventComments(System.Int32,System.String,System.Int64)
member.summary: Adds a comment to the event with the specified ID. The parent event ID can be also specified if needed.
member.remarks: Send parentId=0 or don't send it at all if you want your comment to be on the root level

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.VoteForEvent(System.Int32,System.Int64[])
member.summary: Sends a vote to a certain option in a poll-type event with the ID specified
member.remarks: If event is not a poll, then you'll get an error

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.SubscribeOnComments(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Subscribe or unsubscribe on comments of event with the ID specified

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetEventCommentPreview(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get comment preview with the content specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.RemoveEventComment(System.String)
member.summary: Remove comment with the id specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetForums
member.summary: Returns the list of all forums created on the portal with the topic/thread titles, date of creation and update, post text and author ID and display name

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetForumsCount
member.summary: Returns the number of all forums created on the portal

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetThreadTopics(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the list of all thread topics in the forums on the portal with the thread title, date of creation and update, post text and author id and display name

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetLastTopics
member.summary: Returns the list of all recently updated topics in the forums on the portal with the topic title, date of creation and update, post text and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetTopicPosts(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the list of all posts in a selected thread in the forums on the portal with the thread title, date of creation and update, post text and author ID and display name

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.AddThreadToCategory(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add thread to category

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.AddTopic(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,ASC.Forum.TopicType)
member.summary: Adds a new topic to an existing thread with a subject, content and topic type specified
member.param: ID of thread to add to

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.UpdateTopic(System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Updates a topic in an existing thread changing the thread subject, making it sticky or closing it

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.AddTopicPosts(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a post to an existing topic with a post subject and content specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.UpdateTopicPosts(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates a post in an existing topic changing the post subject or/and content

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.SearchTopics(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of topics matching the search query with the topic title, date of creation and update, post text and author

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.DeletePost(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a selected post

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.DeleteTopic(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a selected topic

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.DeleteThread(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a selected thread

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.DeleteThreadCategory(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a selected thread category

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.RemindAboutBirthday(System.Guid,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Subscribe or unsubscribe on birthday of user with the ID specified

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.CreatePage(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new wiki page with the page name and content specified in the request

member.summary: Returns the list of all pages in wiki or pages in wiki category specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetPage(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Return the detailed information about the wiki page with the name and version specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetHistory(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the list of history changes for the wiki page with the name specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.SearchPages(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the list of wiki pages with the name matching the search query specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.SearchPagesByContent(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the list of wiki pages with the content matching the search query specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.UpdatePage(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates the wiki page with the name and content specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.DeletePage(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the wiki page with the name specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.CreateComment(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates the comment to the selected wiki page with the content specified in the request

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.GetComments(System.String)

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Community.CommunityApi.DeleteFile(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes the files with the specified name from the wiki 'Files' section

member.summary: Remove comment with the id specified in the request
